name: Senpais_Trains
title: Senpais Trains
author: LuziferSenpai
description: This Modification for Factorio, includes Electric Trains, Battle Trains and -Wagons, a new Artillery Wagon, 2 new Breaking Forces, Automatic Coupling and Smarter Trains via Circuit Network and a GUI for Stats, Overview and more that is Train related! Let me know if you have Ideas for more Features!
